code: import{createStore,combineReducers}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import FavoriteProduct from'../Reducer/Redusr';import cartReducer from'../Reducer/cartReducer';const rootReducer=combineReducers({favoriteProduct:FavoriteProduct,Cart:cartReducer});const store=createStore(rootReducer,composeWithDevTools());export default store;
